amendatorysection.catchline: Tobacco; vapor products; alternative nicotine products; sale to minors; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: Whoever shall sell, give, or furnish, in any way, any tobacco in any form whatever, or any cigarettes, cigarette paper, vapor products, or alternative nicotine products, to any minor under eighteen years of age, is guilty of a Class III misdemeanor for each offense.
